sections.name: Edolpho Phinelli
sections.text: Edolpho Phinelli, the notorious con artist, has developed a new scheme. He's selling an elixir that he claims can heal wounds, erase scars, and regrow hair. The citizens that live in the red light district are buying it by the case-full. Edolpho is looking to get rich quick! Fast enough to hop on a ship out of the city with enough earnings to set himself up in a new town.

link.name: Pathfinder Encounter: Phinelli's Miracle Elixir pg. 0
link.alt: Pathfinder Encounter: Phinelli's Miracle Elixir pg. 0

link.name: Pathfinder Encounter: Phinelli's Miracle Elixir pg. 0
link.alt: Pathfinder Encounter: Phinelli's Miracle Elixir pg. 0

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Elf
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the elf ancestry. Elves are mysterious people with rich traditions of magic and scholarship who typically have low-light vision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by elves. A weapon with this trait is created and used by elves.

traits.name: Half-Elf
traits.text: A creature with this trait is part human and part elf. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by half-elves.

traits.name: Human
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

link.name: Pathfinder Encounter: Phinelli's Miracle Elixir pg. 0
link.alt: Pathfinder Encounter: Phinelli's Miracle Elixir pg. 0

interaction_abilities.name: Versatile Performance
interaction_abilities.text: Edolpho can use Performance instead of Diplomacy to Make an Impression and instead of Intimidation to Demoralize. He can also use an acting Performance instead of Deception to Impersonate.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than that listed in the Damage entry. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon that is versatile S can be used to deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make an attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Nonlethal
traits.text: An effect with this trait is not inherently deadly. Damage from a nonlethal effect knocks a creature out rather than killing it. You can use a nonlethal weapon to make a lethal attack with a –2 circumstance penalty.

ability.name: Sneak Attack
ability.text: Edolpho deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
